description: E2E Tests for Keyboard Shortcuts - Comprehensive Playwright tests for navigation, action, and general keyboard shortcuts

userStories.title: Navigation shortcut G+H goes home
userStories.description: As a user, I press G then H to navigate to the home page from any page.
acceptanceCriteria: From /books page, pressing G then H navigates to /

userStories.title: Navigation shortcut G+B goes to books
userStories.description: As a user, I press G then B to navigate to the books page.
acceptanceCriteria: From home page, pressing G then B navigates to /books

userStories.title: Navigation shortcut G+G goes to graph
userStories.description: As a user, I press G then G to navigate to the graph page.
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing G then G navigates to /graph

userStories.title: Navigation shortcut G+T goes to tags
userStories.description: As a user, I press G then T to navigate to the tags page.
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing G then T navigates to /tags

userStories.title: Navigation shortcut G+A goes to authors
userStories.description: As a user, I press G then A to navigate to the authors page.
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing G then A navigates to /authors

userStories.title: Action shortcut J/K for list navigation on home page
userStories.description: As a user on a list page, I use J to move down and K to move up through items.
acceptanceCriteria: On home page, pressing J highlights next content card
Pressing K highlights previous content card

userStories.title: Action shortcut Enter opens selected item
userStories.description: As a user, I press Enter to open the currently selected list item.
acceptanceCriteria: After selecting item with J, pressing Enter navigates to that note

userStories.title: Action shortcut O opens resource link (note page)
userStories.description: As a user on a note page with a URL, I press O to open the resource link.
acceptanceCriteria: On a note with url field (e.g., 12-design-patterns-in-vue), pressing O opens link in new tab
Link opens in new browser tab/window

userStories.title: Action shortcut Shift+L copies wiki-link (note page)
userStories.description: As a user on a note page, I press Shift+L to copy the wiki-link format.
acceptanceCriteria: On note page, pressing Shift+L copies [[slug]] to clipboard

userStories.title: Action shortcut Shift+C copies URL (note page)
userStories.description: As a user on a note page with a URL, I press Shift+C to copy the URL.
acceptanceCriteria: On a note with url field, pressing Shift+C copies URL to clipboard
Clipboard contains the note's source URL

userStories.title: General shortcut ? shows shortcuts modal
userStories.description: As a user, I press ? to view all available keyboard shortcuts.

userStories.title: General shortcut / opens search
userStories.description: As a user, I press / to open the search modal.

userStories.title: General shortcut Cmd+K opens search
userStories.description: As a user, I press Cmd+K (or Ctrl+K) to open the search modal.

userStories.title: General shortcut Escape closes modal
userStories.description: As a user, I press Escape to close any open modal.
acceptanceCriteria: With search modal open, pressing Escape closes it
With shortcuts modal open, pressing Escape closes it

userStories.title: General shortcut Cmd+Alt+T toggles dark mode
userStories.description: As a user, I press Cmd+Alt+T to toggle between light and dark mode.
acceptanceCriteria: Page reflects the new color mode (dark/light class changes)

userStories.title: General shortcut Cmd+Shift+\ toggles focus mode
userStories.description: As a user, I press Cmd+Shift+\ to toggle focus mode (hide header).
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Meta+Shift+\ hides the header (focus mode)

userStories.title: General shortcut ] toggles table of contents (note page)
userStories.description: As a user on a note page, I press ] to toggle the table of contents visibility.
acceptanceCriteria: On a note page with TOC, pressing ] toggles TOC visibility
